DOC.brief_summary: This study compare Measles , Mumps , Rubella , Varicella Vaccine ( V221 ) concomitant administration Varivax M-M-R II vaccines healthy child .
DOC.brief_title: ProQuad™ Versus M-M-R II™ VARIVAX™ Healthy Children ( V221-009 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: In good health Negative clinical history varicella , shingle , measles , mumps , rubella Previous receipt measles , mumps , rubella and/or varicella vaccine either alone combination Any immune impairment deficiency Exposure measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster 4 week prior vaccination Vaccination inactive vaccine past 14 day Vaccination live vaccine within past 30 day Immune globulin blood product administer past 3 month
